DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is (1) to establish the feasibility, yield, and clinical impact of a "Test & Treat TB" strategy on a mobile HIV screening unit in South Africa and (2) to assess the cost and cost-effectiveness of this mobile, integrated HIV/TB screening strategy for maximizing linkage to TB care and treatment completion.
DOC.brief_title: Test and Treat TB: A Proof of Concept Trial in South Africa
DOC.criteria: English or Zulu speaking presenting for screening at mobile unit voluntarily undergoing HIV testing able and willing to give informed consent willing to share HIV and TB test results willing to attend one of six local clinics for treatment access to a mobile phone pregnant
